title: A Plead fot Normal "Human/Everyday" skins.
body:
Dear riot i say this in behalf of thousands of summoners in the last four years of which ive been playing your amazing creations i have seen hundreds of skins such as " Gentleman Chogath" and "Spell thief lux' after all these exotic skins please I implore and plead that you create a skin or two that imploy everyday themes such as " working class Gragas" and Butcher Darius"

Please and thank you your fellow summoners-
